name: Oddworld: The Oddboxx
description: The Oddboxx is a compendium of the first four games from Oddworld Inhabitants. It contains the previously released on PC titles Oddworld: Abe's Oddysee and Oddworld: Abe's Exoddus, along with the never released on PC titles, Oddworld: Munch's Oddysee and Oddworld: Stranger's Wrath.
